integrate.description: Shall this componenten (e.g. energy carrier, energy conversion unit, storage, demand, etc.) be integrated or not

grid_power.description: Option to indicate whether energy carrier is consumed via gas grid, power grid or no grid

grid_energy.description: Energy-related share of infrastructure (grid) energy costs
grid_energy.displayname: Infrastructure, e.g. grid, costs for energy

energy.description: Energy costs for purchase and sale of energy

lim_actual.description: Actual limit for power consumption or selling, if necessary: used to scale profile (PV,Wind ,District Heat feed in)

lim_technical.description: Technical feasible upper limit for power (thermal or electrical) consumption, increase from 'Actual power consumption limit' towards this number requires additional investment, needs to be >= than 'Actual power consumption limit'
lim_technical.displayname: Technical upper bound of power consumption

co2_fossil.description: Fossil CO2 emissions per MWh of this energy carrier

co2_biogen.description: Biogenous CO2 emissions per MWh of this energy carrier

inv_fix.description: Fixed costs as soon as investment decision is made

inv_power.description: Specific power-related costs for investment, e.g. for limit extension of sources or for conversion units or storages

inv_energy.description: Energy related costs if investment decision is made

exist.description: does this unit already exist or not (needs to be build, leads to investment

max_capacity.description: Upper bound of capacity for new units or upper bound of existing unit. Depending on unit: for boilers and heat pumps regarding thermal generation, for turbines regarding electricity generation

min_capacity.description: Only relevant for new units à can not be build smaller than this. Depending on unit: for boilers and heat pumps regarding thermal generation, for turbines regarding electricity generation

minload.description: Minimum part-load operation point related to full load.Depending on unit: for boilers and heat pumps regarding thermal generation, for turbines regarding electricity generation

fullload_efficiency.description: Efficiency for full load operation. Depending on unit: for boilers and heat pumps regarding the 2end law efficiency, for turbines regarding electric efficiency

minload_efficiency.description: Efficiency for minimum load operation. Depending on unit: for boilers and heat pumps regarding the 2end law efficiency, for turbines regarding electric efficiency

ramp.description: ramping ability of a unit, e.g. if a 100 MW boiler can change its load with 20 MW per hour would be 0.2 share_of_cap/h

min_on.description: Minimum running time after a start-up

min_off.description: Minimum offline time of a unit after shut-down

inv_cap.description: Specific investment costs for integration of new units or new sources (e.g. PV modules, grid connection)

opex_fix.description: fixed hourly operation costs for unit

soc_min.description: minimum state of charge, related to capacity

invest_cap.description: storage capacity (energy) related costs if investment decision is made

days_off.description: Number of days process is off
days_off.displayname: Number of days process is off

heat_hua.description: Heat humid air (between in- and outlet temp)

temp_in_hua.displayname: Temperature humid air at inlet HEX

temp_out_hua.displayname: Temperature humid air at outlet HEX

heat_owh.description: Heat other waste heat  (between in- and outlet temp)
heat_owh.displayname: Heat other waste heat for T_in ->T_out

temp_in_owh.description: Temperature other waste heat (input heat exchanger)
temp_in_owh.displayname: Temperature other waste heat at inlet HEX

temp_out_owh.description: Outlet temperature other waste heat stream
temp_out_owh.displayname: Temperature other waste heat at outlet HEX

pressure.description: absolute pressure of steam levels in bar

max_share_out_mis.description: Maximum share of provided energy of middle pressure steam in percent

max_share_out_lis.description: Maximum share of provided energy of live steam in percent

max_share_out_his.description: Maximum share of provided energy of high pressure steam in percent

max_share_out_los.description: Maximum share of provided energy of low pressure steam in percent

max_share_out_wwa.description: Maximum share of provided energy of warm water in percent

max_share_in_biomass.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by biomass in percent

max_share_in_sludge.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by sludge in percent

max_share_in_internal_waste.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by internal waste streams in percent

max_share_in_external_waste.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by external waste in percent

max_share_in_coal.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by coal in percent

max_share_in_natural_gas.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by natural gas in percent

max_share_in_biogas.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by biogas in percent

max_share_in_hydrogen.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by hydrogen in percent

max_share_in_other_solid.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by other solids in percent

max_share_in_oil.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by oil in percent

max_share_in_biomethane.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by biomethan in percent

max_share_in_electricity.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by electric power in percent

max_share_in_biofuel.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by biofuel in percent

max_share_in_other_gaseous.description: Maximum share of fuel that can be provided by other gaseous in percent

depreciation_period.description: Depreciation period used to consider investment costs as total annual costs

interest_rate.description: Interest rate used to consider investment costs as total annual costs

price_co2_fossil.description: Certificate costs for fossil CO2 emissions

price_co2_biogen.description: Certificate costs for biogen CO2 emissions

cost_gas_grid.description: Power-related costs for gas grid bound energy carriers

cost_power_grid.description: Power-related costs for power grid bound energy carriers

free_certificate_fossil.description: Amount of annual free certificates for industrial site
free_certificate_fossil.displayname: Amount of annual free certificates for fossil emissions

decarbonization_fossil.description: Which level of decarbonization needs to be achieved?

free_certificate_bio.description: Amount of annual free certificates for industrial site
free_certificate_bio.displayname: Amount of annual free certificates for biogen emissions

decarbonization_bio.description: Which level of decarbonization needs to be achieved?
